description: Leave the bird's nest of cables at home. Reduce the need to carry multiple cables and adapters.With both micro USB and Lightning cables engineered into the battery, you don't need to hassle with other cables.Time is money. This battery saves time. 3.4A output delivers a good charging rate.Efficiently charges your devices and reduces your wait.The information you need is always easy to see. Battery level meter uses four LEDs.Simply shake the battery and immediately see the power level reflected in four LEDs.A backup battery that is just as mobile as your devices. Compact size and weight.The Energetic3 backup/recharging battery is small and lightweight (10.4 ounces) so it's always easy to take along.Specifications:Capacity: 8400mAhBattery Type: Lithium-ion battery cellInput: DC 5V 1.0A (USB cable charger included)Output: DC 5V 3.4ADimensions: 4.3 x 2.4 x 0.9 inchesWeight: 10.4 ouncesWeCare at BrightechAt Brightech, we stand behind all our products 100%. That's why we offer an industry leading 5-year satisfaction guarantee on all of our LED bulbs. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your order, please contact us via email and we will make sure to make things right!
title: Brightech - Energetic3™ - Portable Battery Charger with Integrated Lighting and Micro-USB Cables - 8400Ah Battery Cell - Perfect for Travel and Road Warriors - The Most Convenient and Smart Way to Charge Your Phone On the Go - Apple Certified
